summary: The diff shows App.tsx was modified to remove BackendConnectionGate wrapper, but the BackendConnectionGate.tsx component file itself was not deleted as required by REQ-2.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the BackendConnectionGate.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/common/ since it is no longer used
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows BackendConnectionGate.tsx is listed under MODIFIED FILES but no deletion occurred. The file should be in REMOVED FILES but it is not.
